name: Evocator Eveque
effectText:
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the GY. While this card is a Normal Monster on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it become an Effect Monster with this effect.
‚óèIf this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 FIRE Warrior monster or 1 Gemini monster in your GY, except "Evocator Eveque"; Special Summon it. You can only use this effect of "Evocator Eveque" once per turn.
